page.title: 19Events.
page.content: {In The News - Summer 1985.} An appeal fund to raise money for the crumbling spire of Salisbury Cathedral has been launched by the Prince of Wales.The 404 foot spire is in danger of collapsing and will cost Â£6.5 million to strengthen. A peace convoy was banned from holding a pop festival at Stonehenge.Near the stones they were met by police. After a pitched battle there were dozens of arrests. Two Tidworth boys found stolen regimental silver worth Â£128.000.Kevin Johnston,15, received a cheque for Â£3.000 and a metal detector.Andrew Phillips,10, received Â£3.000 and a BMX bike.The silver was stolen from Molton Barracks, Tidworth 18 months ago.The total amount raised at Downton's St. Laurence church fete in June was Â£800.
